column3: I guess you are {age} years old!
A person called {username} is a fool if reading this line
I get more of your time that you of mine
Wood in the stove, hair on the floor
You have a thousand more important to do than this
Media type is {type} and id is {id}
INPUT string TITLE pYourName TO username
MENU TITLE mMain OPTIONS oAge oLaugh TO option
IF EQ option oAge THEN GOTO age
IF EQ option oLaugh THEN GOTO laugh
INPUT positiveInteger TITLE pYourByear TO byear
